sentences.en: Factories turned out shoddy and overpriced items. Many houses went private.
sentences.cn: 工厂生产出大量劣质高价的产品, 许多房子纷纷出售给私人.

sentences.en: He accused the garage of shoddy workmanship on the bodywork.
sentences.cn: 他指责汽车修理厂车身修理工艺拙劣.

sentences.en: He resorted to shoddy workmanship and used inferior maaterials.
sentences.cn: 他的手工作的毛毛躁躁,用的材料也是次品.

sentences.en: He resorted to shoddy workmanship and used inferior materials.
sentences.cn: 他的手工做得毛毛糙糙,用的材料也是次品.

sentences.en: His essay was a pretty shoddy piece of work.
I'm normally quick to complain about shoddy service.
sentences.cn: 对劣质服务我通常会立刻投诉。

sentences.en: It is a fairly shoddy way to treat an employee.
sentences.cn: 这样对待雇员真是十分可鄙.

sentences.en: It is up to the teacher not to accept shoddy work.
sentences.cn: 教师不应接受敷衍潦草的作业.

sentences.en: Our new washing - machine keeps breaking down it's entirely due to shoddy workmanship.
sentences.cn: 我们的新洗衣机老出毛病 -- 完全是因为做的质量太差.

sentences.en: The fake and shoddy goods gave rise to the consumers'complaints.
sentences.cn: 假冒伪劣商品引起了消费者的投诉.

sentences.en: The market was glutted with shoddy goods.
The shoddy product will even create the damage to the engine.
sentences.cn: 劣质产品甚至会对发动机造成损伤.

sentences.en: This is a shoddy piece of work ; it's hardly presentable.
sentences.cn: 这 活儿 不像样,拿不出手.

sentences.en: We must put quality before quantity ; We should rather go without than have something shoddy.
sentences.cn: 我们必须重视质量,宁缺毋滥.

sentences.en: We rap the manufacturers on their knuckles if the toy is shoddy.
sentences.cn: 如果玩具质量低劣，我们会痛斥制造商。

words.tran_cn: 质量很差地；粗制滥造地

trans.tran_en: made or done cheaply or carelessly
